title: Holt Barkl and Landers on resistance - pattern

content.question: Which of the following best describes the relationship between the developments described in Source 1 and Source 2?

choices.label: Violent conflict in Georgia spread south and threatened the security of St. Augustine, creating a need to reinforce the colonies’ defenses.
The exploitation of Africans as mercenaries in Florida motivated many people to migrate north to join Angolan communities.
The African cultural traditions that were common in Britain’s southern colonies influenced the culture of Spain’s colony in Florida.
Knowledge of the promise of freedom in Florida encouraged enslaved people in regions to the north to resist slavery.

content.answer: Knowledge of the promise of freedom in Florida encouraged enslaved people in regions to the north to resist slavery.
